title: dashboard_api_endpoint_quality_kpi_retrieval
description: Verify that the dashboard API endpoint correctly retrieves and returns real-time quality KPIs and statistics for display on the main dashboard.

title: deviation_management_api_endpoint_deviation_creation_and_filtering
description: Test the deviation management API endpoint for creating new deviations, filtering existing deviations, and retrieving deviation analytics data.

title: quarantine_management_api_endpoint_quarantine_record_handling
description: Validate the quarantine management API endpoint for logging quarantine details, updating quarantine decisions (release, scrap, rework), and fetching quarantine analytics.

title: non_conformity_management_api_endpoint_nc_form_workflow
description: Ensure the non-conformity management API endpoint supports creation, progression, and approval workflows of DF, 8D, and MDI non-conformity forms with proper status tracking.

title: equipment_calibration_api_endpoint_equipment_status_and_calibration_history
description: Check the equipment calibration API endpoint for managing equipment status, recording calibration history, and scheduling maintenance activities.

title: supplier_quality_api_endpoint_supplier_audit_management
description: Test the supplier quality API endpoint for planning, executing supplier audits, capturing audit findings, and tracking corrective actions.

title: internal_audit_management_api_endpoint_audit_planning_and_execution
description: Verify the internal audit management API endpoint for planning audits, executing them, documenting findings, and generating audit reports.

title: kaizen_continuous_improvement_api_endpoint_kaizen_initiative_tracking
description: Validate the Kaizen continuous improvement API endpoint for filing improvement suggestions, tracking status, assigning owners, and monitoring implementation progress.

title: document_management_api_endpoint_document_upload_and_pdf_viewing
description: Ensure the document management API endpoint supports uploading documents, version control, and PDF viewing capabilities.

title: authentication_api_endpoint_role_based_access_control_and_session_management
description: Test the authentication API endpoint for user login, role-based access control enforcement, and secure session management using Supabase.
